Hot Fill PET Bottles

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4362″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]Normally PET bottles caused deformation when the temperature of the liquid over 65°C due to glass transition.

Thanks to the design contributions of our GM Cai Yuansen,WASHUNhas developed the revolutionary multiple blowing stage and air cooling system two methods for hot fill (heat set) PET bottles. Both of systems are introduced to reduce the level of PET residual stress and increase the rate of PET crystallization. Now PET bottles can stand hot filling without any deformation at all.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3881″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Applications
Fruit juices, isotonic drinks, teas and coffees, soy sauce …
Advantages
Increasing the filling temperature without any deformation.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]Air cooling system and multiple blowing stages are special designed for heat set PET bottles which also it called as heat resistance PET bottles;  Currently, all of our standard two stage stretch blow molding machines could add the air cooling system options, the Multiple blowing stages is only available for MG-HR series.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
